text: In Chile, a general election was held on 21 November 2021, including presidential, parliamentary and regional elections. Voters elected the President of the Republic, 27 of 50 members of the Senate and all 155 members of the Chamber of Deputies in the National Congress. A second round was held on 19 December 2021 where Gabriel Boric was elected the 36th President after winning almost 56% of the vote.Gabriel Boric, a Former Student Activist, Is Elected Chileâ€™s Youngest President He will be the youngest president of Chile ever elected. ==References== Category:2021 elections Category:2021 in South America 2021 general election Category:December 2021 events Category:November 2021 events Category:General elections
title: 2021 Chilean general election
